definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: constrain, bring into straits, press upon (NH [[חוּק]] be distressed (rare), Hiph. = BH; Ar. d.a0qa (y) be narrow, tight, so Eth. t’oqa:; Aram. [[עִיק]], 9aq; Chr Pal. s.wq);—Pf. 3 fs. [[הֵחִיקָה]] Ju Jdg 16:16, sf. [[הֱחִיקַתְהוּ]] Jdg 14:17, [[נִי]]- Job 32:18 (Gi v:Job 32:19); 1 s. [[וַהֲחִיקוֹתִ֫י]] consec. Is 29:2; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇחִיק]] De 28:53 + 2 t.; 3 mpl. [[יׇחִיקוּ]] Je 19:9; Pt. [[מֵחִיק]] Is 51:13, Is 51:13, pl. [[מְחִיקִים]] Is 29:7; —bring into straits, by importunity c. [[ל]] pers. Ju Jdg 16:16, c. sf. pers. Jdg 14:17; constrain (to speak) Job 32:18 (sf. pers.); elsewhere of bringing into straits a city or people, c. [[ל]], Is 29:2, Is 29:7, so Is 7:6 (reading [[וּנְחִיקֶנׇּה]] for MT [[וּנְקִיחֶנׇּה]]), Thes Che Du Gr Marti, cf. formula [[לְ]] ´[[בְּמָחוֹר וּבְמָחוֹק אֲשֶׁר יׇח]] De 28:53, De 28:55, De 28:57, Je 19:9; pt. abs. [[הַמֵּחִיק]] Is 51:13, Is 51:13 the oppressor.
